title: 403: CHATTY BROS: The Bro’s Wedding Guide
itunes:title: 403: CHATTY BROS: The Bro’s Wedding Guide
description:
It’s Friday! Evan discusses his surgery and how it wrapped with an MLM pitch and Grayston discusses being a best man at a wedding this past weekend and how it wrapped with an MLM pitch! Then they break down their rules for the perfect wedding - Bro’s style! Grayston details what his dream wedding to Bekah will look like and they wrap with an unwrapping of some Plug Somethin’!

 

PLUG SOMETHIN’:

BUTTON DESIGNS: Website: www.mariebuttondesigns.com Instagram: www.instagram.com/buttondesigns_/  

O Wool: Website: https://o-wool.com/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/owool/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

FIGS: Head to WEARFIGS.COM and use code CHATTYBROADS to get 15% off your first order!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
